channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [SPARK-23799] [CBO] FilterEstimation.evaluateInSet produces devision by zero in a case of empty table with analyzed statistics
item.description:
Spark 2.2.1 and 2.3.0 can produce NumberFormatException (see below) during the analysis of the queries, which are using previously analyzed hive tables. 

The NumberFormatException occurs because in FilterEstimation.scala on lines 50 and 52 the method calculateFilterSelectivity returns NaN, which is caused by devision by zero. This leads to NumberFormatException during conversion from Double to BigDecimal. 

NaN is caused by devision by zero in evaluateInSet method. 

Exception:

item.summary: [CBO] FilterEstimation.evaluateInSet produces devision by zero in a case of empty table with analyzed statistics

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
